mapred

Interface TaskTrackerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskTracker

    public interface TaskTrackerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This is a interface class of Task Tracker
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin
